name: asx
author: Owen Densmore

attic.build-three: node bin/build3modules.js; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs libs/threelibs -d libs/threelibs
attic.build-as: mkdir lib; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs src -d lib
attic.gh-pages: npm run build-docs && git add -f docs && git commit -m 'gh-pages' && git push origin master
attic.make-page: git merge master && npm run build && git add --all && git add -f doc test/scripts models/scripts dist libs && git commit -m 'master merge'
attic.gh-pages0: git checkout gh-pages && npm run make-page && git push origin gh-pages --follow-tags && git checkout master
attic.build-src: npm run build-test && npm run build-models && npm run build-dist

mkdirs: doc docs dist libs test/scripts models/scripts

scripts.clean: rm -rf `node bin/pkgkey.js mkdirs` && npm run mkdirs
scripts.zip: rm asx.zip; zip -r asx.zip dist libs src test models
scripts.now: now && now alias # deploy to https://asx.now.sh/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-test && npm run build-models && npm run build-dist && npm run build-doc && npm run build-deps && npm run build-docs
scripts.build-docs: cp -Rp `node bin/pkgkey.js docsfiles` docs && echo `node bin/pkgkey.js docstheme` > docs/_config.yml
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-bundle && cp -Rp src dist/modules
scripts.watch: npm run watch-test & npm run watch-models & npm run watch-src
scripts.git-tag: git tag -a `node bin/pkgkey.js version` # uses version: above
scripts.git-prep: npm run build && git add --all && git status
scripts.git-commit: git commit -v && git push origin master --follow-tags
